MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description: Gmagon aims to provide amazing simple and powerful solutions for you.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Site_Title: XLS2csv - convert XLS files to CSV on Mac
Site.Site_Description_100: XLS2csv helps those who are looking for a gadget to convert XLS files to CSV format on Mac OS.
Site.Site_Description_250: XLS2csv is an easy-to-use XLS to CSV converter for Mac. It helps those who are looking for a gadget to convert XLS files to CSV format on Mac OS.
Site.Site_Description_450: XLS2csv is a streamlined file converter that easily converts the XLS format out there to the CSV. The software can intelligently recognize XLS files or directory and transform them to CSV files quickly. Users are allowed to drag and drop a file or directory to the interface of XLS2csv, and preview the conversion results before the conversion finished.
Site.Site_Keywords: xls to csv converter for mac, convert excel files to csv on mac, convert xls to csv on mac, mac xls 2 csv converter, excel to csv converter for mac

English.Keywords: xls2csv, xlsx to csv converter, xls to csv converter mac, mac xlsx to csv converter, excel to csv converter for mac
English.Char_Desc_45: convert XLS/XLSX files to CSV on Mac
English.Char_Desc_80: XLS2csv is an easy-to-use XLS/XLSX to CSV converter for Mac.
English.Char_Desc_250: XLS2csv is an easy-to-use XLS/XLSX to CSV converter for Mac. It helps users to batch convert XLS/XLSX files to CSV format on Mac OS X.
English.Char_Desc_450: XLS2csv is a simple and intuitive XLS/XLSX to CSV Converter for Mac. It handles .xls/.xlsx files from Microsoft Excel, Apple Numbers, Open Offices Excel and converts them to .csv text file format on Mac platform. This app can intelligently recognize large XLS/XLSX files as well as a group of XLS/XLSX files and batch convert them to CSV format quickly.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
XLS2csv is a simple and intuitive XLS/XLSX to CSV Converter for Mac. It handles .xls/.xlsx files from Microsoft Excel, Apple Numbers, Open Offices Excel and converts them to .csv text file format on Mac platform.
This Mac XLS2csv converter app can intelligently recognize large XLS/XLSX files as well as a group of XLS/XLSX files and batch convert them to CSV format quickly. Users are allowed to drag-and-drop a file or directory to the interface of XLS2csv, and preview the loaded Excel spreadsheets before conversion. Plus, you can customize delimiters in the CSV as comma, semicolon, space, tab, etc.
XLS2csv converter fits into any budget and grows with your needs. Try the app now and see how it can make your job easier. Everything you need is contained in one simple installer, no additional downloads or plug-ins are required. We make it simple for you, now and later!
